etymologies: modern Latin, based on Greek orkhis, literally ‘testicle’ (with reference to the shape of its tuber)

definitions: an orchid of (or formerly of) a genus native to north temperate regions, characterized by a tuberous root and an erect fleshy stem bearing a spike of typically purple or pinkish flowers.
shortDefinitions: orchid of or formerly of genus native to north temperate regions

definitions: any wild orchid occurring in temperate regions.
shortDefinitions: any wild orchid occurring in temperate regions
